description: The Outlook installation includes a predefined HOL file called outlook.hol in the following directory:
You can add new holidays to this file by opening it in a text editor and appending holidays to the end of the file in the following format:
[Description] Holiday description, yyyy/mm/dd Holiday description, yyyy/mm/dd ...
The next time you open Outlook, these new holidays will display on the calendar. You can share this updated file with team members so they have the same holiday events.
